import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import Logo from '../../Assets/Logo/Logo'; import { FiSearch } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { AuthContext } from '../../Context/AuthContext'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import MenuDropDown from '../Menu/Menu'; import './Header.css'; const Header = () => { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const { user, logout } = useContext(AuthContext); const [balance, setBalance] = useState(0); const [isDropdownOpen, setIsDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { if (user?.balance) setBalance(user.balance); else setBalance(0); }, [user]); return (
{/* Logo */}
navigate('/')}>
{/* Search */}
{/* Auth */}
{!user ? (<> setShowModal(true)}>Đăng nhập {" / "} Đăng ký ) : (
setIsDropdownOpen(!isDropdownOpen)} > {user.surname + ' ' + user.name}
{isDropdownOpen && ()}
)}
); };
